des: Hive Stories are part of the Edsmart Children Books. Get ready for laughs, age appropriate stories for children. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
